name: Falling Bullets
description:
Falling Bullets - Start your adventure in the tank, which you can defeat tens, hundreds and even thousands of players. The gameplay focuses on rivalry in armored battles between players from around the world in PvP interactions. Falling Bullets are preserved in a cartoon and friendly atmosphere.Key Features:
    - Very good looking map
    - Addictive gameplay
    - Multiplayer mode
    - No pay2win (I too hate that)
    - Early Access
    - English language support
Mode List
    - Deathmatch
    - Team Elimination
Come back for more soldiers, because we win the war! Woo-hoo!
